org.mini2Dx.core.collisions

Interface QuadTree<T extends Positionable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Parallelogram, PositionChangeListener<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConcurrentPointQuadTree, ConcurrentRegionQuadTree, PointQuadTree, RegionQuadTree

    public interface QuadTree<T extends Positionable>
extends PositionChangeListener<T>, Parallelogram
    Common interface for Quad Tree implementation

      • debugRender

        void debugRender(Graphics g)

      • add

        boolean add(T element)
        Adds an element to this QuadTree
        Parameters:
        element - The element to add
        Returns:
        False if the element exists outside of this QuadTree's bounds and was not added

      • remove

        boolean remove(T element)
        Removes an element from this QuadTree
        Parameters:
        element - The element to remove
        Returns:
        True if the element was found and removed

      • addAll

        void addAll(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<T> elements)
        Adds all element to this QuadTree. Note that if an element exists outside of this QuadTree's bounds, it will not be added
        Parameters:
        elements - The elements to add

      • removeAll

        void removeAll(com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<T> elements)
        Removes all elements in this QuadTree and stores them in an Array
        Parameters:
        elements - After executing, this Array will contain all the removed elements

      • clear

        void clear()
        Same a removeAll(Array) except the results are not stored
